kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Window Handles
kw.doc: Returns all child window handles of the selected browser as a list.

kw.name: Switch Window
kw.doc: Switches to browser window matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Location Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Get Location
kw.doc: Returns the current browser window URL.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

test.name: TC01_Correct_Login

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Window Handles
kw.doc: Returns all child window handles of the selected browser as a list.

kw.name: Switch Window
kw.doc: Switches to browser window matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Location Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Get Location
kw.doc: Returns the current browser window URL.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Reload Page
kw.doc: Simulates user reloading page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Verify Login Success
Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'If you forgot your password, please contact the system administrator.'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.arg: If you forgot your password, please contact the system administrator.

kw.name: Verify Login Success
Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'For first-time students, log in with your student ID.'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.arg: For first-time students, log in with your student ID.

kw.name: Verify Login Success
Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Login Failed: Your user ID or password is incorrect'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.arg: Login Failed: Your user ID or password is incorrect
